body.p: Which two structures will change shape or diameter to adjust for distance and amount of light to form a sharp image on the photoreceptors?

feedback.p: Incorrect. These are two fluids of the eye but don’t change shape.
Incorrect. One of these can change shape, but other doesn’t adjust.
Correct. Smooth muscle of the iris change diameter of pupil and smooth ciliary muscles change shape of lens for accommodation.
Incorrect. One of these can change shape, but other doesn’t adjust.
Incorrect. One of these can change shape, but other doesn’t adjust.

hint.p: Both involve contraction of smooth muscles to change its shape.
